description: Five Spice Tofu with crispy seasoned tofu tossed in a sticky sauce is an explosion of flavours. It's the perfect combination of sweet, savoury, spicy and tangy and it's really quick and easy to make.
name: Five Spice Tofu
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup (60 mls) rice vinegar (, or apple cider vinegar)
2 tablespoons soy sauce (, or tamari or coconut aminos for GF)
2 large cloves garlic (, minced or grated)
1 tablespoon toasted sesame oil (omit to make free)
1 block extra firm tofu (, they vary in size slightly but about 450 g/16 oz)
3 tablespoons cornstarch (, (corn flour in the UK) - DO NOT USE ARROWROOT )
2 tablespoons oil (of choice, omit to make oil-free)

recipeInstructions.text: Press the tofu for at least 30 minutes. Either use a tofu press or wrap the block of tofu in a clean dish towel and stack some heavy things (like cookbooks and canned foods)on top of it. While it's pressing make the sauce.

video.description: My Five Spice Tofu with crispy tofu tossed in a sticky sauce is an explosion of flavours. It's the perfect combination of sweet, savoury, spicy and tangy and it's a really quick and easy recipe to make.
video.name: Five Spice Tofu
